abstract: In this sleek coffee-table volume, Linda O'Keefe explores the subtleties of white -- and traces its historic and cultural roots -- in interiors, architecture, and art.
snippet: In this sleek coffee-table volume, Linda O'Keefe explores the subtleties of white -- and traces its historic and cultural roots -- in interiors, architecture, and art.
lead_paragraph: This season has produced a bumper crop of design books--three of which cover the spectrum from the glamorous to the practical. The first in our three-part installment.
